Texts.Chs: 击败进攻科技城的企鹅。
Texts.Eng: Defeat the penguins attacking Techno City.

Texts.Chs: 这份企鹅的入侵地图上显示了它们进攻的下一个目标：科技城。科技城坐落于遥远星系的一颗星球上。我应该阻止这些企鹅们。
Texts.Eng: The penguins' map shows their next assault target: a city on a distant planet known as Techno City. I should put a wrench in their invasion plans!

Texts.Chs: 嗯，科技城使我想起了以前的事，希望那些企鹅们会给这趟旅途带来不一样的快乐！
Texts.Eng: Wow, that was quite the horde of penguins! Something about this city gives me nostalgia, though...
